author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds an option to dump IgProf profiles at {pre,post}ModuleEvent signals. The behavior can be configured with  `reportModules` (`vstring` for module labels) and `reportModuleTypes` (vstring for module C++ types) parameters: if the current module has either the label in `reportModules` or type in `reportModuleTypes`, the profile is dumped. The profile file names can be set with `reportToFileAt{Pre,Post}ModuleEvent (string for file name pattern) parameters. A new pattern `%M` is added for the module name.

#### PR validation:
title: Add option in IgProfService to dump profiles at {pre,post}ModuleEvent
